name: Alchemy Inc
description:
A game made as part of the Galway Game Jam December 2020.

You've gone and done! A magical job in a magical shop.

Time to test your skills and keep customers happy.

Make sure you mix their requested potions right!

 Test your potion brewing skills and keep the customers happy.

Controls

WASD + E
